name: Integrate ChoreDispatcher with TMUX
description: Create a TMUX integration that displays chore status information in the status bar or as a dedicated pane. Should show active chores, their current workflow states, and provide real-time updates. Implementation should follow UNIX philosophy with clean C/C++/Python components.

name: Create context prompts for ChoreWorker and ChoreReviewer
description: Design and implement parameterized context prompts for ChoreWorker and ChoreReviewer agents. These prompts should accept working directory and chore ID parameters to provide contextual guidance for agents working on specific chores. Should include workflow state awareness, completion criteria, and role-specific instructions following the mathematical UNIX expert persona.
progress_info: Created context_prompts.py with worker/reviewer prompt generation. Includes Carl Sagan persona, workflow awareness, and completion criteria.
review_info: Context prompts tested and operational. Generates role-specific prompts with chore details and guidance.

name: Generate comprehensive TMUX integration README
description: Create detailed documentation for TMUX integration including installation steps, configuration examples, status display formats, troubleshooting, and usage patterns. Should replace existing TMUX_README.md with complete user guide.
progress_info: Generated comprehensive TMUX integration README with installation, configuration, troubleshooting, and advanced usage sections. Includes status codes, examples, and performance notes.
review_info: README complete with detailed user guide covering all aspects of TMUX integration. Ready for review chain.

name: Fix automatic chore archiving system
description: Debug and fix the automatic archiving system that should move completed chores (WORK_DONE status) from active chores.jsonl to completed archive. The update() method archival logic is not functioning correctly - completed chores remain in active file.
progress_info: Fixed archival system by reordering save operations. Archive occurs before save, ensuring completed chores are properly removed from active list.
review_info: Archival fix tested and verified. Completed chores now automatically move to archive file.

name: First review of TMUX README
description: Review generated TMUX integration README for technical accuracy, completeness, and clarity. Check installation steps, configuration examples, and troubleshooting sections. Make necessary edits and improvements.
progress_info: Reviewed TMUX README for technical accuracy. Added full path examples, improved setup instructions, enhanced troubleshooting section with file verification steps.
review_info: Technical review complete. Documentation now includes both copied script and full path options, better error handling guidance.

name: Design robust chore lifecycle management system
description: Design and implement a comprehensive chore lifecycle management system that ensures chores exist in exactly one location: either active (chores.jsonl) or completed (chores_completed.jsonl). System must handle state transitions, automatic archival, chore chaining activation, and prevent dual-location existence. Include validation, cleanup utilities, and atomic operations.
progress_info: Created comprehensive chore lifecycle management system design. Analyzed current architecture, identified issues, and designed ChoreLifecycleManager with atomic operations, archival management, and chain activation.
review_info: Design complete with detailed architecture, implementation plan, error handling, and migration strategy. Ready for implementation.

name: Implement ChoreLifecycleManager core infrastructure
description: Create ChoreLifecycleManager class with StateTransitionEngine, atomic transaction support, and validation framework. Implement core state transition logic with proper error handling.
progress_info: Implemented ChoreLifecycleManager core infrastructure with StateTransitionEngine, IntegrityValidator, and atomic transaction support. System can validate chore locations and detect integrity issues.
review_info: Core infrastructure complete with validation detecting 2 completed chores in active file. Ready for Phase 2 ArchivalManager implementation.
